sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_dropdownField
sub_interfaces.description:
Generic single select dropdown field that handles read-only logic dynamically. 

For instances where a custom value should be displayed when the component is read-only, pass it into the "readOnlyValue" input.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!displayValue: displayvalue(
    ri!value,
    ri!choiceValues,
    ri!choiceLabels,
    null
  ),
  if(
    ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(
        isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        local!displayValue,
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField_v1"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      placeholder: if(
        ri!noPlaceholderLabel,
        null,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(
          wrapInMarkers: true,
          placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!placeholderLabel,
            replacementValue: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayCommonObjectBundleLabel(
              bundleKey: "AS.CO.CommonObjects.lbl_co_2"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: if(
        isnull(local!displayValue),
        null,
        ri!value
      ),
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
      required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    )
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_multipleDropdownField
sub_interfaces.description:
Generic multi select dropdown field that handles read-only logic dynamically. 

For instances where a custom value should be displayed when the component is read-only, pass it into the "readOnlyValue" input.

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!displayValues: joinarray(#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!value,
    expression: displayvalue(fv!item, ri!choiceValues, ri!choiceLabels, null)
  ), ", "),
  local!i18nData:rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(
    bundleFolder: cons!AS_CO_I18N_FLD_INTERNATIONALIZATION_FILES,
    bundleNames: "AS.CO.CommonObjects"
  ),
  if(ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        local!displayValues,
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_multipleDropdownField_v1"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      placeholder: if(
        ri!noPlaceholderLabel,
        null,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder(
          wrapInMarkers: true,
          placeholder: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!placeholderLabel,
            replacementValue: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
              i18nData: local!i18nData,
              bundleKey: "AS.CO.CommonObjects.lbl_co_2"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: ri!value,
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: ri!showWhen,
      required: ri!required,
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    )
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField
sub_interfaces.description: Standard readOnly field, utilizes a!textField(), use a!richTextDisplayField() for further formatting

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
  label: ri!label,
  labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    readOnly: true
  ),
  instructions: ri!instructions,
  helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
  value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!value,

      ),
      "-",
      ""
    )
  ),

  readOnly: true,
  align: ri!align,
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_INP_paragraphField
sub_interfaces.description: Standard wrapper for a!paragraphField()

data.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: null,
    showHyphenIfValueNull: ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    height: ri!height,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount
  )
)

rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
  returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
  logicalExpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
    operator: "AND",
    filters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "is null"
    )),
  pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1,10)
).data

rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
  returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
  additionalFilters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: a!flatten(index(
        rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
          returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
          logicalExpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
            operator: "AND",
            filters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
              field: "parentCriteriaId",
              operator: "is null"
            )),
            pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1,10)
        ).data,
      "criteriaId",
     {}))
    )
  }
)

rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluatorTeam(
  returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
  pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(1,10),
  logicalExpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
    operator: "AND",
    filters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "teamId",
    operator: "not null"
  ))
).data

rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluation(
  returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT,
  additionalFilters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
    field: "evaluationId",
    operator: "not null"
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CPS_createOrUpdateEvaluationSteps
sub_interfaces.description: Contains the section details for the create or update evaluation wizard

data.sail_code:
choose(
  /*If isWeightedFactorsRequired is false skip the weights step in the evaluation wizard*/
  if(
    and(
      not(
        a!defaultValue(
          ri!evaluation.isWeightedFactorsRequired,
          true
        )
      ),
      ri!activeStep > 1
    ),
    ri!activeStep + 1,
    ri!activeStep
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluationCriteriaSetup(
    evaluationFactors: ri!evaluationFactors,
    evaluationSubFactors: ri!evaluationSubFactors,
    evaluation: ri!evaluation,
    i18nData: ri!i18nData,
    readOnly: ri!factorReadOnly,
    showSubFactorGrid: ri!showSubFactorGrid
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluationFactorWeights(
    bundle: ri!i18nData,
    evaluationFactors: ri!evaluationFactors,
    evaluationSubFactors: ri!evaluationSubFactors
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluatorTeam(
    evaluatorTeams: ri!evaluatorTeams,
    evaluation: ri!evaluation,
    i18nData: ri!i18nData,
    readOnly: ri!evalTeamReadOnly,
    evaluationFactors: ri!evaluationFactors,
    evaluationSubFactors: ri!evaluationSubFactors,
    evaluatorAliases: ri!evaluatorAliases
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_CPS_assignFactors(
    evaluationFactors: ri!evaluationFactors,
    evaluationSubFactors: ri!evaluationSubFactors,
    i18nData: ri!i18nData,
    evaluatorTeams: ri!evaluatorTeams,
    evaluation: ri!evaluation,
    userDetails: ri!userDetails
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CPS_richTextWithShowMoreLess
sub_interfaces.description: Generic interface for displaying rich text fields

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!shortenIfLongerThanLen: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
    default: ri!shortenToLen
  ),
  local!showLess: true,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: a!defaultValue(ri!label, null),
    labelPosition: a!defaultValue(ri!labelPosition, "COLLAPSED"),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip,
    value: a!match(
      value: ri!text,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
        ri!showHyphen = true
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "-", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: or(
        a!isNullorEmpty(ri!shortenToLen),
        ri!shortenToLen = 0
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: fv!value, color: "STANDARD"),
      default: if(
        len(ri!text) <= local!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: ri!text,
          color: "STANDARD",
          size: ri!textSize
        ),
        if(
          local!showLess = true,
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: trim(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_left(text: ri!text, numChars: ri!shortenToLen)
              ) & "... ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "More",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show More",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, false)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          },
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: ri!text & " ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "Less",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show Less",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, true)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          }
        )
      )
    ),
    preventWrapping: ri!preventWrapping,
    tooltip: ri!tooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    align: ri!align,
    marginAbove: ri!marginAbove,
    marginBelow: a!defaultValue(ri!marginBelow, "NONE"),
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_GSS_INP_factorWeight
sub_interfaces.description: Displays the input field component for factor weights.

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
  label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
    bundle: ri!bundle,
    bundleKey: "acs_WeightPoints",
    arguments: {
      ri!factor.criteriaName,
      "points"
    }
  ),
  labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
  accessibilityText: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!factor.parentCriteriaId),
    "Values for factor weight points cannot exceed 100",
    "Values for subfactor weight points cannot exceed its corresponding factor weight"
  ),
  value: ri!factor.factorWeight,
  saveInto: {
    ri!factor.factorWeight,
    a!save(
      ri!isWeightAboveHundred,
      if(
        todecimal(
          save!value
        ) > cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS,
        true(),
        false()
      )
    ),
    a!save(
      ri!factor.factorWeight,
      a!match(
        value: todecimal(save!value),
        whenTrue: rule!AS_GSS_UT_isBlank(value: fv!value),
        then: fv!value,
        whenTrue: fv!value < 0,
        then: 0,
        whenTrue: fv!value > cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS,
        then: cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS,
        default: round(fv!value, 2)
      )
    )
  },
  align: "RIGHT"
)

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATOR_TEAM,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters.value,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!teamId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "teamId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!teamId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive=true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
expression_rules.description: Given a newObject, an oldObject, and the auditConfig, determines the auditActionCode

data.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)
data.definition:

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getFactorDocumentMapping
expression_rules.description: returns factor document mappings

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_FACTOR_DOCUMENT_MAPPING,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping',
  returnType: if(
    ri!returnFactorSubfactorCount = true,
    cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_AGGREGATION,
    cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,

  ),
  executeWhen: or(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!documentIds),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaIds)
  ),
  aggregation: if(
    ri!returnFactorSubfactorCount = true,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryAggregation"(
      aggregationcolumns: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryAggregationColumn"(
          field: "document.evalDocumentId",
          isgrouping: true,
          alias: "evalDocumentId"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryAggregationColumn"(
          field: "factor.criteriaId",
          aggregationfunction: "COUNT",
          alias: "factors"
        ),

      }
    ),
    {}
  ),
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "document.evalDocumentId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!documentIds,
      applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!documentIds)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "factor.criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaIds,
      applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaIds)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,

    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh
)

)

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit
expression_rules.description: Captures metadata of a CDT if it or any of its children were updated, doing the same for all of its complex MULTIPLE children recursively.  Ideally, we should update this to work for all children.

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_checkIfTotalWeightEqualsUpperLimit
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the provided factors weights sum to the provided weight, or the default of 100, with some leniency to account for summing fractions

data.sail_code:
/*
Note:
If total parent factor weight reaches anywhere between
99.95 and 100, we round off the total parent factor weight
to 100.

If total subfactor weight reaches anywhere between (x-1).95 and x,
where "X" is the parent factor weight, we round off the total
subfactor weight to x.
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!upperLimit: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!parentFactorWeight,
    default: cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS
  ),
  and(
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) >= 0,
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) <= 0.05
  )
)
data.definition:
/*
Note: 
If total parent factor weight reaches anywhere between 
99.95 and 100, we round off the total parent factor weight 
to 100.

If total subfactor weight reaches anywhere between (x-1).95 and x,
where "X" is the parent factor weight, we round off the total 
subfactor weight to x. 
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!upperLimit: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!parentFactorWeight,
    default: cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS
  ),
  and(
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) >= 0,
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) <= 0.05
  )
)

inputs.name: parentFactorWeight
inputs.description:
If a value is passed, checks whether total sum of subfactors weights matches its parent factor weight.
If a value is NOT passed, checks whether total sum of parent factors weights matches 100.

test_cases.test_name: Parent Factor - When total weight is 100, but atleast one of the weights is null or 0
SubFactor - When total weight matches factor weight, but atleast one of the weights is null or 0
SubFactor - When total weight matches factor weight and no weights are null or 0
Parent Factor - When total weight is 100 and no weights are null or 0

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_BL_returnContinueSetupStepByContext
expression_rules.description: Returns the active step for continue setup wizard based on context and weighted factors flag

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!isWeightedFactorsRequired: a!defaultValue(ri!isWeightedFactorsRequired, false()),
  a!match(
    value: ri!context,
    equals: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_FACTORS,
    then: 1,
    equals: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_WEIGHTS,
    then: 2,
    whenTrue: and(
      not(local!isWeightedFactorsRequired),
      fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_TEAMS
    ),
    then: 2,
    whenTrue: and(
      local!isWeightedFactorsRequired,
      fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_TEAMS
    ),
    then: 3,
    whenTrue: and(
      not(local!isWeightedFactorsRequired),
      fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_ASSIGNMENT
    ),
    then: 3,
    whenTrue: and(
      local!isWeightedFactorsRequired,
      fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_ASSIGNMENT
    ),
    then: 4,
    default: 1
  )
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(
  local!isWeightedFactorsRequired: a!defaultValue(ri!isWeightedFactorsRequired, false()),
  a!match(
    value: ri!context,
    equals: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_FACTORS,
    then: 1,
    equals: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_WEIGHTS,
    then: 2,
    whenTrue: and(
      not(local!isWeightedFactorsRequired),
      fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_TEAMS
    ),
    then: 2,
    whenTrue: and(
      local!isWeightedFactorsRequired,
      fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_TEAMS
    ),
    then: 3,
    whenTrue: and(
      not(local!isWeightedFactorsRequired),
      fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_ASSIGNMENT
    ),
    then: 3,
    whenTrue: and(
      local!isWeightedFactorsRequired,
      fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_ASSIGNMENT
    ),
    then: 4,
    default: 1
  )
)

test_cases.test_name: Returns step 2 for UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_TEAMS without weighted factors
Returns step 3 for UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_TEAMS with weighted factors
Returns step 3 for UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_ASSIGNMENT without weighted factors

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Returns true if the value is null, CDT with all null fields, an empty string, string with only spaces, list of null values or an empty list. Otherwise returns false.

data.sail_code:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios,

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios, 

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull, 
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
expression_rules.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)
data.definition:

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria
expression_rules.description: Returns evaluation criteria details based on the given filter set

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CRITERIA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters.value),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!logicalExpression),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!aggregation),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!parentCriteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentCriteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getTemp = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)
